channel.title: Text to Ascii on
channel.description: Recent content in Text to Ascii on

item.title: Project: Figlet Online - Text To ASCII Converter Tool
item.description: Figlet is a brilliant tool to convert text to amazing ASCII Art that I have used for many years. This weekend I thought of creating an online version of it, so that anyone can use it even if they can’t install it on their systems. It is pretty easy to use. The drill is just to choose the font you want (and there is a very extensive collection of more than 250 to choose from), input the text that you want to be ASCII’fied, press a button and you are done.
